Name: R&D
activities_discription: Each group perform R & D project in their specific domain.
Project may be funded by government agencies or sponsored by MeitY.
They are high end solution for the public use cases.

Name: Academic
activities_discription: Formal programs are conducted by CDAC Noida in association with IP university.
International programs are conducted under MEA scheme of Government of India.
